name: Ares
abode: Mount Olympus, temples in mainland Greece, Crete and Asia minor
sibling: Aeacus, Angelos (Greek mythology)|Angelos, Aphrodite, Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Dionysus, Eileithyia, Enyo, Eris (mythology)|Eris, Ersa, Hebe (mythology)|Hebe, Helen of Troy, Hephaestus, Heracles, Hermes, Minos, Pandia, Persephone, Perseus, Rhadamanthus, the Graces, the Horae, the Litae, the Muses, the Moirai
children: Erotes (mythology)|Erotes (Eros and Anteros), Phobos (mythology)|Phobos, Deimos (mythology)|Deimos, Phlegyas, Harmonia (mythology)|Harmonia, Enyalios, Thrax (mythology)|Thrax (personification of Thrace), Oenomaus, Cycnus (son of Ares)|Cycnus, and Amazons
